headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: “Cash, what are the top quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks to watch as LLY reaches a milestone?”

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: It seems the retail sector is holding its breath, waiting to see if consumers will keep their wallets closed or open them wide.

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: The surge of Eli Lilly to a $1 trillion market cap underscores growing investor confidence in the healthcare sector. As small- and mid-cap stocks gain attention, it's clear that the market is favoring nimble players over giants. Investors should keep an eye on these quant-rated picks as they could potentially offer significant returns in a shifting landscape.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Turning now to developments in the healthcare sector.
